data.title: Public Golf Course & Club in Kyle & Austin, TX
data.meta_description: Plum Creek is an exquisite Par 71, 18 Hole Championship Public Golf Course open to everyone. Interested in our golf memberships? Call (512) 262-5555.
data.text:
In addition to great public golf open to everyone in the Austin TX area, Plum Creek also offers golf membership packages that will save you money and get you discounts on golf merchandise in our fully stocked pro shop.

Need to work on your game? Plum Creek has developed a revolutionary Golf Instruction & Lessons Program to grow the game. We also have an outstanding practice facility and driving range. We offer youth golf camps and junior golf camps and love bringing our next generation a love for the game of golf.

Conveniently located halfway between Austin and New Braunfels, Plum Creek Golf Course draws locals, business travelers and golfers from all over the Texas Hill Country region. Our location and our recently renovated banquet and events center make Plum Creek a great meeting place for golf outings, tournaments, or your next event. You can book online tee times for your convenience.

Don’t forget to visit our newly remodeled Glenn’s Bar & Grill while at Plum Creek. Whether you want to dine in or take advantage of our grab and go menu, Glenn’s Bar & Grill offers great food and happy hour specials.
